item.host: RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes Extra
RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Informacoes Extra

item_prototype.name: Status admin $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Tráfego de entrada $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: The number of octets in valid MAC frames received on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Tráfego de saída $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: The number of octets transmitted in MAC frames on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Erros de entrada $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Status operacional $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Erros de saída $1 - {#IFALIAS}
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

template.template: RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos
template.name: RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos
template.description: Informações sobre Módulos Ópticos, só coleta do gbic q tem info!

discovery_rule.name: Network Optical Modules Info
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB. Interfaces with down(2) Administrative Status are not discovered.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<={RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>={RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01) and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({RR Huawei SNMPv2 - Interfaces Info Modulos Opticos:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}> -40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Baixo
